Get SF spatial data.frame for selected data type.
gp
R6 class storing health statistics for a single GP practice.
gp_grp
R6 class storing health statistics for a list of gp health units.
health_data_scotland()
Launch shiny application
health_unit
R6 class representing a health unit e.g. a GP practice or hospital.
health_unitgrp
R6 class storing health statistics for a list of health units.
hospital
R6 class storing health statistics for a single hospital.
hospital_grp
R6 class storing health statistics for a list of hospital health units.
map
R6 class for creating interactive map of health units.
